text: Isa Isa is the central character of a historical fiction graphic novel series, Les Passagers du vent (The Passengers of the Wind) by François Bourgeon. As Isa's character is revealed through the course of the story which spans 5 albums, she is conscious of her own sensuality, and know how to exploit it to reach her goals. A modern woman within a male-dominated 17th century framework. == Further reading == . Category:Comics characters introduced in 1980
title: Isa (comics)
